title: Breakingviews TV: Marchionnderci
text:
Breakingviews TV: Marchionnderci 6:25pm BST - 04:31
May 31 - Fiat Chrysler’s CEO unveils a new five-year plan this week, his last before retiring next year. Rob Cox and Antony Currie discuss his successes – and how he has to leave overhauling its European unit and investing in electric and self-driving cars to his successor. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
May 31 - Fiat Chrysler’s CEO unveils a new five-year plan this week, his last before retiring next year. Rob Cox and Antony Currie discuss his successes – and how he has to leave overhauling its European unit and investing in electric and self-driving cars to his successor.
